string-array.name: debug_open_intercept
string-array.item: It will be possible to access and edit files on your device using a computer.
Installing apps on your device without your explicit permission will be allowed.
"You'll be able to monitor and record your screen content remotely."
It will be possible to access the detailed information about your device.

string-array.name: miui_optimization_close_intercept
string-array.item: Important: Multiple system apps might stop working properly.
Text layouts, accounts, and content might not be displayed correctly.

string-array.name: perm_intercept_notification
string-array.item: Read all your notifications, including the content of your text messages and other items that might contain personal information
Restrict notification permissions for some apps
Simulate tapping notifications and open apps
Turn DND mode on and off

string-array.name: perm_intercept_statitics
string-array.item: Collect the data about your interests and behavior by learning what apps you use and how often you use them
Access your carrier-related and language settings, as well as other details

string-array.name: perm_intercept_unknown_source
string-array.item: "Third party apps that aren't verified by GetApps might cause multiple problems and decrease system stability."
Some third party apps may contain malware that puts your personal data at risk.
